// Code generated by codegen/idtype/generate.py; DO NOT EDIT.

package idtype

import "fmt"

type ${id_name} int

func (id ${id_name}) Int() int {
	return int(id)
}

func (id ${id_name}) IsZero() bool {
	return id.Int() == 0
}

func Parse${id_name}(i int) (${id_name}, error) {
	if i == 0 {
		return 0, fmt.Errorf("failed to parse ${id_name} %#v", i)
	}
	return ${id_name}(i), nil
}
